name: ECO-System
description:
This is a point-and-click simulation game where the player manages a small ecosystem and watches it grow from a single tree to a lush forest.

Take care of the tree and watch it grow into a lush forest! Plant seeds and discover new plants by combining them. After your plants have grown maybe you'll have some visitors!

How to Play:

Open the menu to plant seeds.

Click on the watering can and then on the plant to water the plants.

Plants produce seeds when they are happy, you can see this when they sparkle.

Click on the shovel, then on seeds on the ground to pick them up.

Some seeds can be combined to create new type of plants, try to plant seeds on the same spot to combine them.
